languages.text: "О, мон-кай, зачем же так неизящно выдавать свой страх и неуверенность? Что, Вольный Торговец дозволяет мне больше, чем тебе, раз ты так стремишься отогнать меня подальше? Это твоя вина, а не моя".

"Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."
languages.original_text: "О, мон-кай, зачем же так неизящно выдавать свой страх и неуверенность? Что, Вольный Торговец дозволяет мне больше, чем тебе, раз ты так стремишься отогнать меня подальше? Это твоя вина, а не моя".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “噢，猴子，何必以如此粗鲁的方式暴露你的恐惧和不安？莫非是因为行商浪人赐予了我更大的自由，所以你急着要把我赶走吗？如果是这样，那就是你的问题，不是我的问题了。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."

traits.locale_text: “噢，猴子，何必以如此粗鲁的方式暴露你的恐惧和不安？莫非是因为行商浪人赐予了我更大的自由，所以你急着要把我赶走吗？如果是这样，那就是你的问题，不是我的问题了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, mon-keigh, faire ainsi étalage de vos peurs et de vos insécurités... Dites-moi, pourquoi chercher à tout prix à me faire partir ? Craindriez-vous que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} m'octroie plus de libertés ? Moi, je n'y suis pour rien. Vous ne pouvez vous en prendre qu'à vous-même. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, mon-keigh, faire ainsi étalage de vos peurs et de vos insécurités... Dites-moi, pourquoi chercher à tout prix à me faire partir ? Craindriez-vous que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} m'octroie plus de libertés ? Moi, je n'y suis pour rien. Vous ne pouvez vous en prendre qu'à vous-même. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Oh, mon-keigh, ¿por qué revelar tu miedo e inseguridad de forma tan burda? {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente me concede mayores libertades, ¿es ese el motivo de tu insistencia en apartarme de su lado? El problema es tuyo, no mío».
languages.original_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, mon-keigh, ¿por qué revelar tu miedo e inseguridad de forma tan burda? {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente me concede mayores libertades, ¿es ese el motivo de tu insistencia en apartarme de su lado? El problema es tuyo, no mío».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、モン＝ケイ、なぜそんな下品なやり方で恐怖と不安を露わにする？自由開拓者は自由でも与えてくれるのか。だから、俺を追い払いたいと？それはお前のせいで、俺のせいではない」
languages.original_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、モン＝ケイ、なぜそんな下品なやり方で恐怖と不安を露わにする？自由開拓者は自由でも与えてくれるのか。だから、俺を追い払いたいと？それはお前のせいで、俺のせいではない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, Chem-Pan-Sey, warum zeigt Ihr Eure Furcht und Unsicherheit auf solch krude Art und Weise? Gewährt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mir größere Freiheiten? Seid Ihr deswegen so erpicht darauf, mich fortzustoßen? Das ist Euer Versagen, nicht das meine."
languages.original_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Chem-Pan-Sey, warum zeigt Ihr Eure Furcht und Unsicherheit auf solch krude Art und Weise? Gewährt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mir größere Freiheiten? Seid Ihr deswegen so erpicht darauf, mich fortzustoßen? Das ist Euer Versagen, nicht das meine."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."

languages.text: "Korkunu, güvensizliğini illa böyle hoyratça göstermek zorunda mısın mon-keigh? Hür Tacir'in bana tanıdığı imtiyazlar mı canını sıkıyor yoksa? O da senin sorunun, benim değil."
languages.original_text: "Oh, mon-keigh, why reveal your fear and insecurity in such a crude manner? Does the Rogue Trader grant me greater liberties — is that why you are so anxious to drive me away? That is your failing, not mine."

traits.locale_text: "Korkunu, güvensizliğini illa böyle hoyratça göstereceksin, değil mi mon-keigh? Hür Tacir'in bana tanıdığı imtiyazlar mı canını sıkıyor yoksa? O da senin problemin, benim değil."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
